mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.post_id, c.member_no_login, a.member_nick, a.profile_img_path AS member_img, c.content, c.updated_at FROM community_comment c JOIN member a ON c.member_no_login = a.member_no_login WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.updated_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_comment (post_id, member_no_login, content) VALUES (#{postId}, #{memberNoLogin}, #{content})
